title: The commendation of matrimony, made by Cornelius Agrippa, [et] translated into englysshe by Dauid Clapam
author: Agrippa von Nettesheim, Heinrich Cornelius, 1486?-1535.
publisher: In ædibus Thomæ Bertheleti typis impress. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,
notes: Translation of: De beatissimae annae monogamia.
The woodcut title-page frame has "1534" in sill.
Running title reads: Prayse of matrimony.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
